text: When we look to the individuals of the same variety O sul-variety of Our older cultivated plants and animals. one of the first points which strikes s. is that generally differ much more from each other. than do the individuals of any one species or variety in a state of nature. Within the limits of the same variety of the same species in a state of nature, there is no difficulty in believing that the individuals generally differ much more from each other than do the individuals of any one species or variety in a state of nature.
